c74object.name: the.oneirotomy.setup
c74object.digest: Upgrade a patch to be compatible with offline rendering using the.jit.renderer~
c74object.description:
Written by Tim Heinze Â© 2022, www.xenorama.com.
Highlight, replace or augment designated Jitter or MSP-objects to record in realtime and render high resolution Jitter content offline.

objarg.name: ctx
objarg.digest: Specify a valid render context for all children objects to sync to
objarg.description: As of Version 2.0 the ctx-name must match that of a jit.world present in the patch. It is necessary to provide a context name for all members of the offline render family to sync and respond to.

attribute.name: verbose
attribute.digest: Post information to the max window
attribute.description: Post information to the max window. All objects which potentially need upgrading will be listed when respective methods are called. Note that in any case, a dictionary with all objects is output from the dump outlet.

method.name: highlight
method.digest: Highlight all potentially relevant objects' boxes
method.description: Highlight all potentially relevant objects' boxes.

method.name: renderer
method.digest: Instantiate the.jit.renderer~ and jit.world with given context name
method.description: Instantiate the.jit.renderer~ and jit.world with given context name. If a jit.world context by this name is already present, an instance of jit.world will not be created. Note, that any jit.window with this context name must be renamed or removed first, for otherwise an error is thrown. The renaming occurs automatically with the upgrade method.

method.name: transform
method.digest: Perform an entire patch upgrade with all possible replacements
method.description: Perform an entire patch upgrade with all possible replacements. This essentially chains the methods upgrade, world and renderer, respectively.

method.name: upgrade
method.digest: Upgrade all designated objects and configurations
method.description: Upgrade all designated objects and configurations

method.name: world
method.description: Upgrade any legacy jit.gl.render setup. Should jit.gl.render and jit.window by the context-name be found, these will be replaced by jit.world and jit.gl.camera. The latter is instantiated when respective options are currently set in the jit.gl.render object. The re-routing of the pipeline and frame-based data/bang flow has to be upgraded accordingly by the user.
